titles.title: To designate the facility of the United States Postal Service located at 34 A Street NE in Miami, Oklahoma, as the "Steve Owens Post Office Building".
To designate the facility of the United States Postal Service located at 34 A Street NE in Miami, Oklahoma, as the "Steve Owens Post Office Building".

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Oversight and Government Reform.

bill.summary: Designates the facility of the United States Postal Service located at 34 A Street NE. in Miami, Oklahoma, as the "Steve Owens Post Office Building."
